caption.p: Maximum clade credibility tree for the major capsid protein vp3 fragment (360 bp) of Kashmir bee virus (KBV). Species name, country of origin, and, if applicable, GenBank accession number are given in the branch label. The branches are coloured according to the lineagesâ€™ inferred geographic origin as shown on the world map and end notes are coloured according to the host group as shown in the host species insert. Posterior support > 0.6 is given and the x-axis shows time in years.
